titleInfo.title: Map of the Lands in Mississippi ceded by the Chickasaws to the United States in 1832 and 1834

mods.abstract: This map from the survey of Henry M. Lusher shows northern half of Mississippi and adjacent parts of Alabama, Tennessee and Arkansas. The Chickasaw-Choctaw boundary is shown beginning at the Mississippi River as well as Indian settlements, white settlements, roads and trails. The map also shows changes made to the Tennessee-Mississippi border.
